tweet: when there is a desire to bring love happiness and peace to your partner as well as other this is a heart chakra based relationship
if your relationship was all about security sex prestige achievement collecting beautiful things these correlate to lower chakras
when releasing an old relationship it can be useful to examine which chakra had the dominant influence on the attraction
relationships that are ruled by the higher chakrasthe heart throat third eye or crown tend to be more enlightening and harmonious
relationships that are ruled by the lower chakras for example tend to experience more challenges and difficulties
the vedas explain that the chakra that is most active in your relationship determines your experience and level of growth
the vedas explain there are 7 types of relationships that we experience in our lives these 7 categories correspond with one of the chakras
